heading: HR00888
0: RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO MAKE INQUIRIES FROM THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR & EMPLOYMENT (DOLE) TO FIND OUT WHY THE DOLE HAS NOT YET ISSUED THE NECESSARY IMPLEMENTING RULES AND REGULATIONS TO REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11165 OR “AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING TELECOMMUTING AS AN ALTERNATIVE WORK ARRANGEMENT FOR EMPLOYEES IN THE PRIVATE SECTOR”
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-05-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00888
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO MAKE INQUIRIES FROM THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR & EMPLOYMENT (DOLE) TO FIND OUT WHY THE DOLE HAS NOT YET ISSUED THE NECESSARY IMPLEMENTING RULES AND REGULATIONS TO REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11165 OR “AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING TELECOMMUTING AS AN ALTERNATIVE WORK ARRANGEMENT FOR EMPLOYEES IN THE PRIVATE SECTOR”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SAVELLANO, DEOGRACIAS VICTOR "DV" B.
DATE FILED : 2020-05-19
